snippet.title: Whateverland - Announcement Teaser (2020)
snippet.description:
---- ADD IT TO YOUR WISHLIST NOW: ----
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1175840/Whateverland/

Welcome to Whateverland, a prison for lost souls, where everyone gets what they truly deserve! This not so classic point-n-click will take you on an adventure through the bizarrely beautiful hand-drawn world. And you’re the only one who decides what kind of story it's going to be!

Whateverland is a point-n-click adventure game with a branching dialogue system, non-linear gameplay, various endings and unique in-game turn-based strategy sport simulator.
